name: Fleshgod
description:
Fleshgod is a roguelike bullet hell space shooter with a procedurally-generated infinite world.

The Run Down

As you sputter up to the warp gate, the attendant gives you a plaintive look.

"Sorry fella, I'd let you have sum rations if I'd dun had any. Only place to eat in the sector is through that there portal. Best be careful though."

Your stomach growls as you punch the thruster up to the gate. Your last bounty paid out 2 weeks ago and you haven't had much to eat since then besides a few stale Klaxot chips. You've heard rumors of a nebula made purely out of edible material. But its inhabitants certainly won't be friendly...
